summary: In the South Pacific islands, two brothers, one good and one bad, fight over the same girl and over a bag of pearls.
cast: Robert Taylor|Stewart Granger|Ann Blyth|Betta St. John|Keenan Wynn|James Whitmore|Kurt Kasznar|Lewis Stone|Robert Burton|Peter Whitney|John Lupton|Jonathan Cott|Mitchell Lewis|James Bell|Leo Gordon|Michael Pate|Clancy Cooper|Frank DeKova|Henry Rowland|Stanley Andrews|George Barrows|Walter Coy|Frankie Crane|John Damler|James Davis|John Doucette|Wesley Gale|Harry Hines|Richard Karlan|Owen McGiveney|Tyler McVey|Vesey O'Davoren|Alexander Pope|Keith Richards|Morgan Roberts|Glenn Strange
title: Todos los hermanos eran valientes
